featured.text: It looks like a precisely engineered jigsaw puzzle, each branch growing just perfectly so it almost, 11 , touches the neighboring tree.

definition.zh_def: 拼圖，一種由多個不規則形狀的片段組成的圖像，通常用於娛樂或教育。
definition.en_def: A puzzle consisting of many irregularly shaped pieces that fit together to form a complete picture, often used for entertainment or educational purposes.
definition.example: We spent the afternoon putting together a jigsaw puzzle of a beautiful landscape.
